description: Established in the summer of 1980, Rideau has always been about providing the best quality blinds to our customers. This has been a key component to our worldwide success, which has allowed us to work with customers from all over the world and use their feedback and recommendations to improve our overall product. We believe that our best marketing strategy is to offer a high quality product at a price that our customers are willing to pay. That is why all of our products are available throughout the year, everyday at the same price. No surprises, no one-day limited deal. You look for quality blinds for your home or your office and we are here to help with that.

facts.title: We grow in all directions
facts.description: Rideau is always looking to expand to new clients and associates while providing a premium experience like no other blinds company out there.

whyTheyPickUs.title: Social and Corporate Responsibility
whyTheyPickUs.text: We've been certified carbon neutral since 2011. All of our products are from recycled materials starting from the 2014 collection.

whyTheyPickUs.title: Premium Experience
whyTheyPickUs.text: Our clients enjoy the first class treatment they receive when they buy from us. We accompany them in all the process and make sure they made the best decision based on our extensive experience.

whyTheyPickUs.title: Generous Refund Policy
whyTheyPickUs.text: We're so confident in our product that we offer a three year refund policy. So far less than 1% of our clients use it.

whyTheyPickUs.title: No Marketing Trickery
whyTheyPickUs.text: All our products are available throughout the year. No season only specials, pick what you need when you need it.
